---
output: pdf_document
---

```{r}
library(kableExtra)
df <- data.frame(a = 1:4, b = 4:7)
kbl(df, format = "latex") |>
    column_spec(2,
        bold = TRUE,
        monospace = TRUE,
        underline = TRUE,
        italic = TRUE,
        color = "red",
        background = "#FFFF00",
        width = "3in",
        border_right = TRUE
        )
```
